index.html.title: JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp
index.html.keywords: JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp is a .Net library to encode and decode BCn BC7 texture compression format. It is based on the bc7enc_rdo library. See https://github.com/richgel999/bc7enc_rdo
